column5: Location is key with this stunning 4 bed / 2.5 bath well-maintained home located in the highly desirable neighborhood of Bulverde Village.   Like to entertain when in S.A.? There is a huge patio with special yard lighting, pergola and bbq pit.    Location is five minutes away from The Village Shopping Center at Stone Oak with an Alamo Drafthouse Cinema, multiple shops, and restaurants near by. Additionally, Walmart, Costco, HEB, a few malls and the international airport only 15 minutes away.
